item.title: Welcome to Magic Book
item.description: Hello! Come in! Come in! It is great to have you here at the gates of my personal journal. A book that if burned, can be regenerated an infinite number of times with pages that can be viewed from anywhere in the world. A ‘magic book’ you might say. Now that might sound grandiose. “Magic!? This is technology don’t be silly.” I assure you that it would have seemed like magic to the poor scribes of ancient china in 868 AD.
